long_description: Enjoy the warm days of summer in the Reef Fanning flip-flops, which offer simple comfort and lightweight support for just about any casual summertime activity. Soft, flexible synthetic nubuck leather strap uppers gently wrap insteps for a secure fit; polyester linings work to wick moisture away from your feet and dry quickly. Compression-molded EVA topsoles/midsoles are contoured to deliver an ergonomic fit and all-day cushioning. Shock-absorbent air pockets in heels protect feet from hard surfaces and are wrapped in durable polyurethane for extra comfort. Recessed polyurethane bottle opener in outsole is designed to minimize impact on traction and supplies light arch support. Rubber outsoles with herringbone-shaped treads deliver traction on most surfaces.
short_description: Enjoy the warm days of summer in the Reef Fanning flip-flops, which offer simple comfort and lightweight support for just about any casual summertime activity.
